table.name: vtiger_affiliates
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_affiliates` ( `affiliatesid` int NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `token` varchar(190) DEFAULT '', `platform_id` int DEFAULT NULL, `sync_to_platform` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `last_sync_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `affiliatesno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`affiliatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_affiliatescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_affiliatescf` ( `affiliatesid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`affiliatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
